TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you accidentally put the drills upside-down.

I wish for some good brie cheese.

Granted, but BRIE would you ask for such a thing? Ahhahahahhaahhaahhaahhaahahathecheeseisalsofilledwithmaggotshahhahahha

I wish that I could beat KSP.

Granted, but the Kentuky State Police press charges for assault and you now how no money left.

I wish i could win the game of Kerbal Space Program

Edited June 22, 2013 by rewdew2

You don't get it

I wish for people to stop necroing here

That Wasn't that good, try again.

Granted, but the Kentuky State Police press charges for assault and you now how no money left.

I wish i could win the game of Kerbal Space Program

Granted. You promptly get horribly bored as there is nothing left to do. You never play KSP again.

I wish I wasn't brand-new to this thread.

Granted, but the new rewritten history with you in this thread since the start of it is horrendously boring due to how much of a giant killjoy you now are.

I wish for a supersonic submarine.

Granted, but the new rewritten history with you in this thread since the start of it is horrendously boring due to how much of a giant killjoy you now are.

I wish for a supersonic submarine.

Granted. It's a Supersonic Submarine Sandwich.

I wish I had all of my old LEGO sets back.

Granted. It's a Supersonic Submarine Sandwich.

I wish I had all of my old LEGO sets back.

Granted. They're all irreversibly dusty and when you try to put two bricks together they fall apart completely. Should've kept them in airtight boxes.

I wish I had an apple pie.

Granted. but it is an apple seed pie, and the poison in the seeds kill you.

I wish i could find a way out of the forums....

Granted, it's a lethal fall.

I wish for a cat.

Granted but its a CAT5e electrical cable

I wish to have my wish horribly corrupted

Granted but its a CAT5e electrical cable

I wish to have my wish horribly corrupted

Granted. You wasted a wish.

I wish I knew how to dock in KSP.

Granted. You must now build a boat and a dock to dock it to.

I wish for a Super Weegee 4001

Granted, but the real Weegee quickly comes in and brutally murders this new impostor Weegee.

I wish that I made my own hit song, "This Is a Song About a Sandwich"

Granted, but you are the sandwich, and there is a hungry army around the corner.

I wish that wishes were incorruptible and that I have as many wishes as I desire.

Granted. However you formulate your next wish wrong and undo everything

I wish someone would make me breakfast

Granted, but I'm an awful cook.

I wish someone would give me a croissant.

granted it has already been eaten

i wish for better art skills

i wish for better art skills

Granted, you are have better art skills. To bad now nobody likes your style, even you so you abandon art completely...

I wish that next person will wish something for me.

granted, here, let me wish something for you.

I wish that the next person reading this will explode in a cloud of debris

I wish that the next person reading this will explode in a cloud of debris

So I explode, and that explosion is so powerful that you are caught in a blast.

Since I exploded I wish to be brought back to life.

Granted, but your brought back to life as an insane goat

I wish that anyone who reads this but me can no longer type on the ksp forums

You come back healthier than ever. The goverment captures you and does horrible experiments on you to find the secret of eternal life

I wish for a cool vacation

granted it is tool cool and you freeze

i wish for photoshop

i wish for photoshop

Granted: it's new, better version. But you will never be able to learn how to use it...

I wish for my computer to explode.
